# TPM scale 

```{r}
h1 <- Heatmap(scale(refTpm), name="Z_TPM", cluster_columns = FALSE)
h2 <- Heatmap(scale(refTpmTransformed), name="Z_TPM_Transformed", cluster_columns = FALSE)
h1+h2
```

# log2 ( TPM + 1 )

```{r}
h1 <- Heatmap(scale(refTpmLog2), name="Z_log2TPM", cluster_columns = FALSE)
h2 <- Heatmap(scale(refTpmLog2Transformed), name="Z_log2TPM_Transformed", cluster_columns=FALSE)
h1+h2
```
